#42 0' 2.9"
32.07 lbs. 		Brutal Star Pokémon Those attacked by Toxapex's poison will suffer intense pain for three days and three nights. Post-recovery, there will be some aftereffects.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Merciless 49 The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
1 Limber 10 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
18 Rain Dish 11 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
36 Suction Cups 6 This Pokémon uses suction cups to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
54 Poison Point 12 Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
72 Regenerator 49 Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
90 Soundproof 12 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
100 Rough Skin 20 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 49 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 04 Insomnia 10 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 08 Trace 11 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
Disc 16 Lifelink 8 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
Disc 18 Mimicry 12 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 24 Frostproof 12 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 26 Super Luck 53 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Disc 34 Water Absorb 24 Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.
Disc 51 Cecity -2 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Disc 52 Damp 2 Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
Disc 55 Regenerator 49 Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
Disc 60 Overcoat 11 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Cold-Blooded 49 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Contrary 72 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Defeatist -54 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Distillize 68 Normal-type moves become Water-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Fumigate 68 Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Gunk Guard 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Noxious Terrain.
Hydration 27 Heals status conditions if it's raining.
Innards Out 11 Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
Inner Focus 11 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Klutz -39 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Limber 10 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Merciless 49 The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
Oblivious 11 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
Poison Point 12 Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
Poison Touch 15 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
Rain Dish 11 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
Rough Skin 20 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sand Spit 49 The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Slow Start -75 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Soundproof 12 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
Sprinkle Spit 49 The Pokémon makes it rain when it's hit by an attack.
Stall -27 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Suction Cups 6 This Pokémon uses suction cups to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
Symbiosis 11 The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
Truant -74 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Water Veil 16 The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
Anger Shell 49 When HP drops to half or less, defenses are lowered but attack and Speed are raised.
Bulletproof 14 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Huge Power 159 Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Noxious Surge 75 Turns the ground into Noxious Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
